ALBUM_CONFIG_DESCRIPTION: Set style of album | Cover Image, Pages, Name, Color
CORRECT_USAGE:
{{author}} | You have used the command incorrectly 
Usage : `{{prefix}}albumconfig <albumName>`
NO_ALBUMS: {{author}} | You haven't made a single album yet
ALBUM_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} | There are no albums in your account with the name `{{albumName}}`
NO_PAGES: The album has no pages: Use `sacf <albumName>` to add pages to the album
ADD_CARDS: Cards: Add cards to your page
MINIMUM_CARDS_NEEDED: An album must contain minimum of two cards
MENU_CARDS_DESC: Set the cards to display on page
MENU_CANCEL_DESC: Stop the interaction and go back
ALLOWED_PATTERNS_COLORS: You are allowed to use geometric patterns or colors. Any character if used on the album background, it has to be official image. The responsibility to find out the source of the image lies with you and posting fanart in backgrounds will get it deleted. Take advice from players in [support server](https://discord.gg/SYt2d2mhuF) before submitting. The amount will be deducted on submission and refunded if rejected.
EMBED_FOOTER: Paste the links below within 2 mins
ENTER_CODES: Enter card codes separated by spaces: `code1 code2 code3`
NO_CARDS_FOUND: No cards found in page. Set cards from the select menu.
EMBED_LAYOUT_CUSTOMIZE_FOOTER: Customize: x - width y - height a - angle z - zoom
NO_GEMS: You do not have enough gems
NO_WISTS: You do not have enough wists
SUBMISSION_ERROR: Cannot submit because you are missing {{ammount}} {{currency}}

WRONG_URL: The url must be a discord image url | Example https://cdn.discord... or https://media.discord..
INVALID_PAYMENT_METHOD: The payment method must be `wist` or `gems`
SUBMISSION_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to submit?
TOTAL_ALBUM_PAGES: No. of pages in this album: `{{totalPages}}`
EDIT_ALBUM_NAME: Name: Edit name of the album
ADD_ALBUM_PAGES: Add Pages: Attach pages to the album
EDIT_ALBUM_DESC: Description: Set description for the album
BUY_PAGE: You need to buy page before adding cards
MAXIMUM_PAGES: You can have maximum of 10 pages per album
MENU_ALBUM_CANCEL_DESC: Stop the interaction and go back
NEW_ALBUM_DESCRIPTION: Enter a description with less than 140 characters for the album
NEW_ALBUM_COLOR: Provide the glow code for the text
NEW_ALBUM_COVER: Provide cover image url to submit
NEW_ALBUM_NOTE: Make sure the image used in the album cover is official. No refunds if you use unofficial images. Take help from users or reverse search to find or hire an album maker. Use the default album cover image to edit it. Only covers in the same shape will be accepted. The resolution for the album cover is `908x658`
ATTACH_ALBUM_PAGES: Type the number of album pages you want to attach to this album
DELETE_ALBUM: Are you sure you want to delete this album permanently?
